profile.name: Sindre Sorhus
profile.headline: Open Source Software Engineer | Swift & JavaScript Specialist | Building macOS Apps, CLI Tools, & npm Packages
profile.about: As a dedicated full-time open-sourcerer, I specialize in crafting robust software solutions with a focus on Swift and JavaScript. My expertise extends to developing a wide range of applications, including intuitive macOS apps, powerful CLI tools, and widely-used npm packages. I am passionate about contributing to the developer community and building high-quality, impactful tools.
profile.current_position: Independent Software Engineer & Open Source Contributor
